colophon.title: Colophon
colophon.para:
The standard typeface used in this book is Source Sans Pro
Source Sans Pro Announcement (2012-08-02):
, the monospaced sequences use Source Code Pro
Source Code Pro Announcement (2012-09-24):
. Both of these beautiful fonts families were designed by Paul D. Hunt at Adobe Systems Incorporated.
This book was composed entirely in Emacs (nXML/RNG mode if you're curious), on various Fedora Linux releases.
